doc.title: Beliyat grad
doc.plot: In one of the most beautiful towns of Bulgaria - Balchik - Bulgarians, Turks, Armenians, Tatars and Gypsies live together. Artists from USA and locals from different ethnic groups share their feelings about the town during the days of the Balchik "Process and Space" festival. This mosaic of life styles landscapes, standpoints and opinions give birth to the truth about Balchik and perhaps about the whole country.
